00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_phase_callback_registry.h -- Definition of the simulation phase callbacks
00023 
00024   The most critical functions are defined inline in this file.  Only active,
00025   if SC_ENABLE_SIMULATION_PHASE_CALLBACKS[_TRACING] is defined during the
00026   SystemC library build.
00027 
00028   Original Author: Philipp A. Hartmann, OFFIS, 2013-02-15
00029 
00030   CHANGE LOG AT END OF FILE
00031  *****************************************************************************/
00032 
00033 #ifndef SC_PHASE_CALLBACK_REGISTRY_H_INCLUDED_
00034 #define SC_PHASE_CALLBACK_REGISTRY_H_INCLUDED_
00035 
00036 #if defined( SC_ENABLE_SIMULATION_PHASE_CALLBACKS ) \
00037  || defined( SC_ENABLE_SIMULATION_PHASE_CALLBACKS_TRACING )
00038 #  define SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_ 1
00039 #else
00040 #  define SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_ 0
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_simcontext.h"
00044 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_object_int.h"
00045 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_status.h"
00046 
00047 #include <vector>
00048 
00049 namespace sc_core {
00050 
00051 class sc_simcontext;
00052 class sc_object;
00053 
00054 class sc_phase_callback_registry
00055 {
00056 public:
00057     typedef sc_phase_callback_registry this_type;
00058     typedef sc_object                  cb_type;
00059     typedef cb_type::phase_cb_mask     mask_type;
00060 
00061     struct entry
00062     {
00063         cb_type*  target;
00064         mask_type mask;
00065     };
00066 
00067     friend class sc_simcontext;
00068     friend class sc_object;
00069 
00070 private: // interface completely internal
00071 
00072     explicit
00073     sc_phase_callback_registry( sc_simcontext& simc );
00074 
00075     ~sc_phase_callback_registry();
00076 
00077     // --- callback forwarders
00078 
00079     bool construction_done()   const; //< returns false
00080     void elaboration_done()    const;
00081     void initialization_done() const;
00082     void start_simulation()    const;
00083 
00084     void evaluation_done()     const;
00085     void update_done()         const;
00086     void before_timestep()     const;
00087 
00088     void simulation_paused()   const;
00089     void simulation_stopped()  const;
00090     void simulation_done()     const;
00091 
00092 
00093     // --- callback registration and implementation
00094 
00095     mask_type register_callback( cb_type&, mask_type mask );
00096     mask_type unregister_callback( cb_type&, mask_type mask );
00097 
00098     // generic caller
00099     void do_callback( sc_status ) const;
00100 
00101 private:
00102     typedef std::vector<entry>    storage_type;
00103     typedef std::vector<cb_type*> single_storage_type;
00104 
00105 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00106 
00107     // set and restore simulation status
00108     struct scoped_status
00109     {
00110         scoped_status( sc_status& ref, sc_status s )
00111           : ref_(ref), prev_(ref) { ref_ = s;}
00112         ~scoped_status() { ref_ = prev_; }
00113     private:
00114         sc_status& ref_;
00115         sc_status  prev_;
00116     }; // scoped_status
00117 
00118     mask_type validate_mask( cb_type&, mask_type, bool warn );
00119 
00120 private:
00121 
00122     sc_simcontext*        m_simc;
00123     storage_type          m_cb_vec;            // all callbacks
00124 #if 0
00125     single_storage_type   m_cb_eval_vec;     //  - eval cb shortcut
00126 #endif
00127     single_storage_type   m_cb_update_vec;   //  - update cb shortcut
00128     single_storage_type   m_cb_timestep_vec; //  - timestep cb shortcut
00129 
00130 #endif // SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00131 
00132 private:
00133     // disabled
00134     sc_phase_callback_registry( const this_type& );
00135     this_type& operator=(const this_type&);
00136 
00137 }; // sc_phase_callback_registry
00138 
00139 
00140 // -------------------- callback implementations --------------------
00141 //                   (empty, if feature is disabled)
00142 
00143 inline bool
00144 sc_phase_callback_registry::construction_done() const
00145 {
00146 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00147     do_callback( SC_BEFORE_END_OF_ELABORATION );
00148 #endif
00149     return false;
00150 }
00151 
00152 inline void
00153 sc_phase_callback_registry::elaboration_done() const
00154 {
00155 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00156     do_callback( SC_END_OF_ELABORATION );
00157 #endif
00158 }
00159 
00160 inline void
00161 sc_phase_callback_registry::start_simulation() const
00162 {
00163 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00164     do_callback( SC_START_OF_SIMULATION );
00165 #endif
00166 }
00167 
00168 inline void
00169 sc_phase_callback_registry::initialization_done() const
00170 {
00171 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00172     scoped_status scope( m_simc->m_simulation_status
00173                        , SC_END_OF_INITIALIZATION );
00174 
00175     do_callback( SC_END_OF_INITIALIZATION );
00176 #endif
00177 }
00178 
00179 inline void
00180 sc_phase_callback_registry::simulation_paused() const
00181 {
00182 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00183     do_callback( SC_PAUSED );
00184 #endif
00185 }
00186 
00187 inline void
00188 sc_phase_callback_registry::simulation_stopped() const
00189 {
00190 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00191     do_callback( SC_STOPPED );
00192 #endif
00193 }
00194 
00195 inline void
00196 sc_phase_callback_registry::simulation_done() const
00197 {
00198 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00199     do_callback( SC_END_OF_SIMULATION );
00200 #endif
00201 }
00202 
00203 // -------------- specialized callback implementations --------------
00204 
00205 #if 0
00206 inline void
00207 sc_phase_callback_registry::evaluation_done() const
00208 {
00209 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00210 
00211     if( !m_cb_eval_vec.size() ) return;
00212 
00213     typedef single_storage_type::const_iterator it_type;
00214     single_storage_type const & vec = m_cb_eval_vec;
00215 
00216     scoped_status scope( m_simc->m_simulation_status
00217                        , SC_END_OF_EVALUATION );
00218 
00219     for(it_type it = vec.begin(), end = vec.end(); it != end; ++it)
00220         (*it)->do_simulation_phase_callback();
00221 #endif
00222 }
00223 #endif
00224 
00225 inline void
00226 sc_phase_callback_registry::update_done() const
00227 {
00228 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00229 
00230     if( !m_cb_update_vec.size() ) return;
00231 
00232     typedef single_storage_type::const_iterator it_type;
00233     single_storage_type const & vec = m_cb_update_vec;
00234 
00235     scoped_status scope( m_simc->m_simulation_status
00236                        , SC_END_OF_UPDATE );
00237 
00238     for(it_type it = vec.begin(), end = vec.end(); it != end; ++it)
00239         (*it)->do_simulation_phase_callback();
00240 #endif
00241 }
00242 
00243 inline void
00244 sc_phase_callback_registry::before_timestep() const
00245 {
00246 #if SC_HAS_PHASE_CALLBACKS_
00247 
00248     if( !m_cb_timestep_vec.size() ) return;
00249 
00250     typedef single_storage_type::const_iterator it_type;
00251     single_storage_type const & vec = m_cb_timestep_vec;
00252 
00253     scoped_status scope( m_simc->m_simulation_status
00254                        , SC_BEFORE_TIMESTEP );
00255 
00256     for(it_type it = vec.begin(), end = vec.end(); it != end; ++it)
00257         (*it)->do_simulation_phase_callback();
00258 #endif
00259 }
